author: rbb
msg: Isolate the APR thread-safety macros.  This makes any macro available to
ANY portion of APR.  It also makes these macros internal to APR only,
because this header file is not exposed to programs which use APR.

author: rbb
msg: I missed one function when swapping paramters.  This fixes it.  I think I
have caught them all this time.  I really hope this is the final time I have

author: bjh
msg: Make use of -lcrypt conditional on actually having libcrypt.a

msg: OS/2: Fix a warning and parameter order to ap_create_threadattr()

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Add some 'const's to match prototypes.
